TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfilePropertySettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfilePropertySettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 节的方法。

span.span: The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式创建、 访问和修改的单个属性添加到定义`properties`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. `profile`配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`部分，以生成一个名为类`ProfileCommon`，它派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 此类的实例创建每个用户配置文件，并可以通过在代码中访问的各个配置文件值属性。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 有关配置文件功能的详细信息添加到[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性值，该值包含一系列对象。The following code example shows how to access the property value, which contains a collection of objects. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`配置文件以生成类的部分称为`ProfileCommon`，它派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 类可以访问和修改的单个用户配置文件值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 指定创建的实例时的参数值类将用于定义相关联的属性中`ProfileCommon`类。The parameter values that you specify when you create an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d).

value.span: 如果 类中关联的属性可由匿名用户设置，则为 ；否则为 ，指示匿名用户不能更改属性值。

span.span: if the associated property in the class can be set by anonymous users; otherwise, , indicating that anonymous users cannot change the property value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`配置文件以生成类的部分称为`ProfileCommon`，它派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 类可以访问和修改的单个用户配置文件值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 指定的实例的属性值类将用于定义相关联的属性中`ProfileCommon`类。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 如果中的属性引发异常`ProfileCommon`由匿名用户更改类时属性值是`false`。An exception is thrown if a property in the `ProfileCommon` class is changed by an anonymous user when the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`配置文件以生成类的部分称为`ProfileCommon`，它派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 类可以访问和修改的单个用户配置文件值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 指定的实例的属性值类将用于定义相关联的属性中`ProfileCommon`类。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 默认值用作初始值关联`ProfileCommon`类属性时的单个用户配置文件不包含属性的值。The default value is used as the initial value for the associated `ProfileCommon` class property when an individual user profile does not contain a value for the property. 属性可能是一个字符串值，XML 编码的值 （该属性的序列化模式是 XML 序列化） 或 base-64 编码二进制字符串 （如果该属性的序列化模式是二进制序列化）。The property may be a string value, an XML-encoded value (serialization mode for the property is XML serialization) or a base-64-encoded binary string (if the serialization mode for the property is binary serialization). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置序列化命名属性时要使用的提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a provider to use when serializing the named property.

value.span: 来自 属性的提供程序名，或一个空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The name of a provider from the property, or an empty string ("").

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件提供程序是用于存储用户配置文件值的数据源。Profile providers are data sources in which user-profile values are stored. 可以指定配置文件中的提供程序`providers`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。You can specify profile providers in the `providers` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. 如果此属性的值为空字符串，在中指定的默认提供程序使用属性。If the value of this property is an empty string, the default provider specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type of the associated property in the dynamically generated class.

span.span: A valid, fully qualified type reference, or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为有效的类型引用时，此类型用于在生成的命名属性`ProfileCommon`类。When set to a valid type reference, this type is used for the named property in the generated `ProfileCommon` class. 类型引用形式，如下所示 （括号中的项不是必需的）： `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]`The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]` 例如:For example: `"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%"` ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
